casebody.data:
XIANG FU HE, Appellant,
v.
TROON MANAGEMENT, INC., et al., Respondents. 2019-363 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 2, 2019

***1001Motion by Defense Association of New York, Inc. for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
